name: 霍弘毅
objective: This course is designed to introduce students to other than English speaking cultures.  This semester we will look at the cultures of 20th century South America through Literature, Film, and Dance.  We will read two Nobel Prize winning authors: Jorge Luis Borges (Argentina) and Gabriel Garcia Marquez (Columbia) among prominent writers and filmmakers. In addition, I will arrange for an instructor to teach the class basic Samba and Tango.
